00029 class tx_MailformPlusPlus_Dispatcher extends tslib_pibase {
00030 
00037         protected function handleAjax() {
00038                 if(t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('xajax')) {
00039                         require (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('xajax') . 'class.tx_xajax.php');
00040                         $this->xajax = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_xajax');
00041                         #$this->xajax->statusMessagesOn();
00042                         #$this->xajax->debugOn();
00043                         $this->prefixId = "F3_MailformPlusPlus";
00044                         $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default");
00045                         $this->xajax->registerFunction(array($this->prefixId.'_removeUploadedFile', &$view, 'removeUploadedFile'));
00046                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData[$this->prefixId] = $this->xajax->getJavascript(t3lib_extMgm::siteRelPath('xajax'));
00047                         $this->xajax->processRequests();
00048                 }
00049         }
00050 
00058         public function main($content, $setup) {
00059 
00060 
00061                 $this->pi_USER_INT_obj = 1;
00062                 $this->componentManager = F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::getInstance();
00063 
00064                 //handle AJAX stuff
00065                 $this->handleAjax();
00066 
00067                 //init flexform
00068                 $this->pi_initPIflexForm();
00069 
00070                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::$cObj = $this->cObj;
00071                 
00072                 /*
00073                  * set controller:
00074                  * 1. Flexform
00075                  * 2. TypoScript
00076                  * 3. Default controller
00077                  */
00078                 $controller = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'controller','sDEF');
00079                 if(!$controller) {
00080                         $controller = $setup['controller'];
00081                 }
00082                 if(!$controller) {
00083                         $controller = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default";
00084                 }
00085                 
00086                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_controller',$controller);
00087                 $controller = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($controller);
00088                 $controller = $this->componentManager->getComponent($controller);
00089 
00090                 /*
00091                  * Parse values from flexform:
00092                  * - Template file
00093                  * - Translation file
00094                  * - Predefined form
00095                  * - E-mail settings
00096                  * - Required fields
00097                  * - Redirect page
00098                  */
00099                 $templateFile = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'template_file','sDEF');
00100                 $langFile = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'lang_file','sDEF');
00101                 $predef = $this->pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'], 'predefined','sDEF');
00102 
00103                 if (isset($content)) {
00104                         $controller->setContent($this->componentManager->getComponent('F3_MailformPlusPlus_Content', $content));
00105                 }
00106                 if(strlen($templateFile) > 0) {
00107                         $controller->setTemplateFile($templateFile);
00108                 }
00109                 if(strlen($langFile) > 0) {
00110                         $controller->setLangFile($langFile);
00111                 }
00112                 if(strlen($predef) > 0) {
00113                         $controller->setPredefined($predef);
00114                 }
00115                 try {
00116                         $result = $controller->process();
00117                 } catch(Exception $e) {
00118                         $result = '<div style="color:red; font-weight: bold">Caught exception: ' . $e->getMessage() . '</div>';
00119                 }
00120                 return $result;
00121         }
00122 }
